verses.name: John 7:41
verses.text: Others said, This is the Christ. But some said, Shall Christ come out of Galilee?

verses.name: John 7:42
verses.text: Hath not the scripture said, That Christ cometh of the seed of David, and out of the town of Bethlehem, where David was?

verses.name: John 7:43
verses.text: So there was a division among the people because of him.

verses.name: John 7:44
verses.text: And some of them would have taken him; but no man laid hands on him.

verses.name: John 7:45
verses.text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees; and they said unto them, Why have ye not brought him?

verses.name: John 7:46
verses.text: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.
